Name: Tiny Being's Ring
Effects: Maximum HP: +5%
AcquiredFrom: Starting gift Reward: Siegmeyer of Catarina in Anor Londo

Name: Cloranthy Ring
Effects: Stamina regeneration: +20% Stacks with Mask of the Child. Stacks with Grass Crest Shield. Stacks with Green Blossom.

Name: Havel's Ring
Effects: Maximum equip load: +50%

Name: Ring of Steel Protection
Effects: Physical defense: +50 points

Name: Spell Stoneplate Ring
Effects: Magic defense: +50 points

Name: Flame Stoneplate Ring
Effects: Fire defense: +50 points

Name: Thunder Stoneplate Ring
Effects: Lightning defense: +50 points

Name: Speckled Stoneplate Ring
Effects: Magic defense: +25 points Fire defense: +25 points Lightning defense: +25 points

Name: Bloodbite Ring
Effects: Bleed resistance: +400%
AcquiredFrom: Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 10,000 souls

Name: Poisonbite Ring
Effects: Poison resistance: +400%
AcquiredFrom: Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 15,000 souls

Name: Cursebite Ring
Effects: Curse resistance: +400%

Name: Red Tearstone Ring
Effects: Attack: +50% when health is below 20%

Name: Blue Tearstone Ring
Effects: Defense: +50% when health is below 20%

Name: Ring of Sacrifice
Effects: Lose nothing upon death Ring breaks when used
AcquiredFrom: Location: Firelink Shrine Location: New Londo Ruins Trade: Snuggly for Humanity Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 5,000 souls

Name: Rare Ring of Sacrifice
Effects: Lose nothing upon deathDeath caused by curse will not take effect Ring breaks when used
AcquiredFrom: Location: Sen's Fortress Location: New Londo Ruins Location: Lost Izalith Trade: Snuggly for Twin Humanities

Name: Bellowing Dragoncrest Ring
Effects: Magic damage: +20-26% depending on spell Stacks with Crown of Dusk
AcquiredFrom: Purchase: Griggs of Vinheim for 20,000 souls

Name: Lingering Dragoncrest Ring
Effects: Magic effect length: +50% Note: Does not increase miracles' effect length.
AcquiredFrom: Purchase: Griggs of Vinheim for 20,000 souls

Name: Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring
Effects: Wearer makes no sound
AcquiredFrom: Location: Sen's Fortress Drop: Griggs of Vinheim

Name: Dusk Crown Ring
Effects: Amount of sorcery castings: +50% Maximum HP: -50%

Name: White Seance Ring
Effects: Attunement slots: +1 slot

Name: Darkmoon Seance Ring
Effects: Attunement slots: +1 slot Grants player entrance to Darkmoon Blades covenant at Anor Londo.

Name: Ring of the Sun's Firstborn
Effects: Miracle power: +20% Stacks with Crown of Dusk/Dark Sun

Name: Darkmoon Blade Covenant Ring
Effects: Allows Gwyndolin to summon one player to invade another player's Dark Anor Londo.
AcquiredFrom: Covenant reward: Given upon joining the Darkmoon Blades covenant

Name: Ring of the Sun Princess
Effects: Boosts miracle synergy
AcquiredFrom: Location: Obtained upon joining the Princess Guard covenant after speaking with Gwynevere in Anor Londo.

Name: Leo Ring
Effects: Counter damage: +40%

Name: Wolf Ring
Effects: Poise: +40 points

Name: Hawk Ring
Effects: Bow range: +50% Enhanced zooming: bows and binoculars
AcquiredFrom: Location: Chest behind Giant Blacksmith in Anor Londo

Name: Hornet Ring
Effects: Critical attack (backstab, riposte): +30%
AcquiredFrom: Location: Darkroot Garden, on a corpse behind the gravestone in the boss area for Sif

Name: East Wood Grain Ring
Effects: Lessens the amount of durability loss. Note: Does not lessen durability loss when using a weapon's special ability (i.e. dragon weapons' two-handed strong attack).
AcquiredFrom: Location: Purchased from Shiva of the East (Blighttown).

Name: Dark Wood Grain Ring
Effects: Changes rolling action to a faster and wider one (ninja flip). Only works when equip load is under 25% as of Patch 1.06
AcquiredFrom: Drop: Shiva's bodyguard Note: Need to be in Forest Hunter covenant for bodyguard to appear.

Name: Rusted Iron Ring
Effects: Removes the movement speed penalty in water, poison swamp, tar, etc.
AcquiredFrom: Location: Undead Asylum (second visit) Note: You need a special key to open a door before reaching the ring. See Undead Asylum for more information.

Name: Covetous Gold Serpent Ring
Effects: Item discovery: +200 points

Name: Covetous Silver Serpent Ring
Effects: Souls absorbed for each kill: +20% Stacks with Symbol of Avarice.

Name: Covenant of Artorias
Effects: Allows entering to The Abyss

Name: Orange Charred Ring
Effects: Reduces lava damage Adds fire element to kick motion

Name: Old Witch's Ring
Effects: Allows talking to Quelaag's Sister Note: Without the ring choosing to talk to her only prompts a "...?" response.
AcquiredFrom: Starting gift Trade: Snuggly for a Sunlight Maggot

Name: Cat Covenant Ring
Effects: Allows Alvina to summon player to protect Darkroot Garden from other players Note: Requires to be a member of the Forest Hunter Covenant to be summoned.
AcquiredFrom: Covenant reward: Given upon joining the Forest Hunter covenant

Name: Ring of Fog
Effects: Turns the player transparent making them un-targetable (but not un-hittable).

Name: Ring of Favor and Protection
Effects: Maximum HP: +20% Stamina: +20% Maximum equip load: +20%. Breaks when removed
AcquiredFrom: Drop: Lautrec Trade: Snuggly for a Xanthous Crown

Name: Ring of the Evil Eye
Effects: Absorbs 30 HP from every fallen enemy Note: Does not stack on multiple kills.

Name: Calamity Ring
Effects: The player receives twice the amount of damage they normally would
